title: Shens late game resource spending.
body:
so i just play shen top for the first time out of customs and aram in a ranked game, i did pretty well cementing my inlane lead over riven when i got a double kill from a failed tower dive. everything was going well till late game. one ult and 2 spells and im out of energy.... are you fucking serious.

i really like shen but his late game resource renewal is garbage 

is it worth getting energy regen runes or is there any other way besides blue buff to get more energy regen?

replies.body:
Hey man. 

I see where you are coming from.
But as a Shen top player ill see if i can cover a few bases here.

Shen is a powerful champion, (he can 1v1 most tanks and ADC's), as well as making his team immune to AA's, globally teleport to them with a shield, as well as forcing them to attack him. and so he has a few weak spots to allow people play against him.

One of these weak spots is that if Shen mucks up his combo, he is left very exposed. 
Shen regains a lot of his energy through landing his abilities (namely Q and E), meaning if he plays well and lands his attacks and initiate, he is rewarded by being able to extend his window of power. However if he mucks up, misses his E and then is forced to retreat, he cant just try again and again. He is punished by now having a window of vulnerability.

With Shen, pretty much as long as you are always hitting your spells, you shouldn't have a problem, and should almost always have enough energy available for your next 1 or 2 spells.

Also it's good to note that your ultimate has no cost, so as long as it is off cooldown, you will always have access to it, and using it wont disadvantage you in the skirmish that you are ulting into.

Personally, I think energy regen runes would be a waste of time, especially seeming in all situations other than a balls-to-the-wall engage, Shen will be sitting on full, or near full energy anyway, It would be better in my opinion to take tanky runes and survive long enough for you to hit all your Q's and regain that energy. 

He does regain energy quite significantly if you land all of your spells. Shen can farm with his Q constantly, and still sit on a full energy pool.

I hope this helps, and good luck with the best ninja in the game ^^ 

Believe it!

:P
